list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: a cylinder or block of wax or tallow with a central wick that is lit to produce light as it burns.
(of a poultry breeder) test (an egg) for freshness or fertility by holding it to the light.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: the egg was candled—it was fertile
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: quả trứng được nến, nó là màu mỡ
